_sText:
I have been a huge fan of STALKER since I first found it and I would like to release this map since the game is out. Though, I think I released it a bit late. :P

Based on actual buildings from the former USSR this map is very realistic. No more soda machines and couches, this map uses new props that should improve and enhance ZM.

Change log:

+ Numerous new spots.
+ Various bugs and exploits fixed.
+ New spots and fixed ones
+ Working grass texture

Enjoy!
